name: IELTS for study
service: Thousands of education and training providers all over the world use IELTS results to select their students.

name: IELTS for work
service: Many professional registration bodies and employers rely on IELTS as evidence of English language proficiency.

name: A test of four skills
service: IELTS is a task-based test covering the four language skills (listening, reading, writing and speaking).

name: Prepare for the test
service: Once you are familiar with the IELTS test format, you will need to undertake a number of focused preparation activities.
